scripts.build: doppler run -- esbuild src/index.ts --bundle --platform=node --target=node20 --format=esm --outfile=dist/index.js --sourcemap --packages=external && ( [ "$ACT_LOCAL" = "true" ] && echo "Skipping swagger generation in act environment" || [ "$SKIP_CONFIG_VALIDATION" = "true" ] && echo "Skipping swagger generation in Docker build" || tsx src/utils/swagger/generate-swagger.ts )
scripts.build:docker-image: esbuild src/index.ts --bundle --platform=node --target=node20 --format=esm --outfile=dist/index.js --sourcemap --packages=external && ( [ "$SKIP_CONFIG_VALIDATION" = "true" ] && echo "Skipping swagger generation in Docker build" || tsx src/utils/swagger/generate-swagger.ts )
scripts.build:docker: doppler run -- NODE_ENV=production SERVER_PORT=3040 esbuild src/index.ts --bundle --platform=node --target=node20 --format=esm --outfile=dist/index.js --sourcemap --packages=external && NODE_ENV=production SERVER_PORT=3040 tsx src/utils/swagger/generate-swagger.ts
scripts.dev: doppler run -- tsx src/utils/swagger/generate-swagger.ts && nodemon --config nodemon.json
scripts.lint: [ "$SKIP_DOPPLER" = "true" ] && pnpm oxlint ./src && eslint ./src --ext .ts,.tsx || doppler run -- pnpm oxlint ./src && eslint ./src --ext .ts,.tsx
scripts.test: [ "$SKIP_DOPPLER" = "true" ] && vitest run --silent --config vitest.config.ts || doppler run -- vitest run --silent --config vitest.config.ts
